Sudden light change in Vision Lab Machine Room
00000 - start with lights on
00796 - John enters from camera to turn lights off
00829 - John leaves image with lights off
01844 - Barry enters, turns on lights, sits at computer
02202 - Barry gone, lights off
02714 - last frame

Testing (for nominal, non-frame-based background technique)
01640 - 1839 Train (lights off)
01839 - 01865 Run
01865 Evaluate (lights on, Barry in scene, door reclosed)
